actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend for 2 years the exclusion for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans, and to place a limit of $300 on the amount of employer contributions which may be excluded by an employee during any taxable year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend for two years from 1985 to 1987 the income tax exclusion for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans. Limits to $300 the amount of employer contributions to such a plan which may be excluded.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend for 2 years the exclusion for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans, and to place a limit of $300 on the amount of employer contributions which may be excluded by an employee during any taxable year.
